nodes.bodyText: FWIW I think we can remove the while loop here and just have two explicit calls to getgrouplist(). If I'm reading the documentation correctly, if the function returns -1, then the real required number of groups will be written to &numGroups and we can just make one more call with that value. (It also gives us a chance to sanity-check the second call to getgrouplist(), which should in theory never fail)
Yes, I thought of doing that as well but figured it was ok to leave as is. I'll update with this change.

I am torn though because this introduces the possibility of the following sequence:

Initial call to getgrouplist
User is added to another group via some other mechanism
Second call to getgrouplist still fails, since the count parameter is wrong

This is not likely but it is one of the reasons I decided to keep the while loop - what do you think?
Ah, that's a very good point. I think that's motivation enough to keep things as-is.
